title: Ticket #1086: Use STARTD_CRON for Benchmark Activity
description:
Instead of having a special activity for benchmarking, use STARTD_CRON. The benchmark attributes can be dynamically maintained.

This requires an expression barrier for invoking STARTD_CRONs, to constrain execution to only the Unclaimed state.
